string-array.name: view_defser_queries
string-array.item: select tvdb_id from series where watchlist = 1 order by name collate nocase

select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where datetime(e.firstAired/1000, \'unixepoch\') between datetime(\'now\') and datetime(\'now\', \'+6 days\') and (s.watchlist = 1 or (e.season = 1 and e.episode = 1)) order by e.firstAired
select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where e.collected = 1 and e.watched = 0 order by s.name collate nocase

select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where datetime(e.firstAired/1000, \'unixepoch\') between datetime(\'now\', \'-7 days\') and datetime(\'now\', \'+7 days\') and e.season = 1 and e.episode = 1 order by e.firstAired
select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where e.collected = 1 or e.watched = 1 order by s.name collate nocase
